doc:
Richard Frank (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Richard_Frank_(actor) 0 Richard Frank (January 4, 1953 – August 27, 1995) was an American actor. He was perhaps best known as Father Vogler in the 1984 movie Amadeus. Frank had numerous guest appearances in television shows, with a regular role in the sitcom Anything but Love. Richard_Frank ( January_4_,_1953 – August_27_,_1995 ) was an_American_actor . He was_perhaps_best_known as Father_Vogler in the_1984_movie_Amadeus . Frank had numerous_guest_appearances in television_shows , with a_regular_role in the_sitcom_Anything but Love .
